content: Thecontrollershallcommunicateanyrectificationorerasureofpersonaldataorrestrictionofprocessingcarried out in accordance with Article 16, Article 17(1) and Article 18 to each recipient to whom the personal data have been disclosed, unless this proves impossible or involves disproportionate effort.
